revised_title: Jewels in My Acquaintance with C. S. Sherrington, F. R. S.
tldr: The article shares personal anecdotes and memories of the author's acquaintance with Charles Sherrington, a renowned English physiologist. It highlights Sherrington's contributions to science, his poetic sense, and his kindness towards young people. The author also mentions Sherrington's role in saving a child's life with diphtheria-antitoxin in 1893 or 1894, long before protective immunization against diphtheria became possible in 1923.
